video.title: Family Guy
video.synopsis: In Seth MacFarlane's no-holds-barred animated show, buffoonish Peter Griffin and his dysfunctional family experience wacky misadventures.

episodes.synopsis: When family man Peter Griffin loses his job, he applies for welfare... but an accounting error nets him a fortune in weekly payments.
episodes.title: Death Has a Shadow

episodes.synopsis: Peter decides to spend more time with his family after he accidentally destroys the city's television transmitter.
episodes.title: I Never Met the Dead Man

episodes.synopsis: Meg's new friend indoctrinates her into a cult. Meanwhile, Lois and Peter make plans for Stewie's first birthday party at Cheesie Charlie's.
episodes.title: Chitty Chitty Death Bang

episodes.synopsis: When Peter turns the basement into a bar during his house arrest, Lois becomes a torch singer. Stewie begins teething and builds a time machine.
episodes.title: Mind Over Murder

episodes.synopsis: Peter becomes jealous of the Griffins' new neighbor, Joe -- a bona fide hero -- and decides to impress his family by foiling a bank robbery himself.
episodes.title: A Hero Sits Next Door

episodes.synopsis: Chris wants to quit the scouts, but is afraid of disappointing Peter. Meanwhile, Lois becomes addicted to gambling, and Peter goes on a vision quest.
episodes.title: The Son Also Draws

episodes.synopsis: Tired of being treated like a second-class citizen by Peter, Brian decides to run away and ends up in the pound fighting for his civil liberties.
episodes.title: Brian: Portrait of a Dog

episodes.synopsis: The Griffins rub elbows with the elite when Lois's aunt dies and wills the family her lavish Newport estate.
episodes.title: Peter, Peter, Caviar Eater

episodes.synopsis: Peter enlists the aid of the Pope in his quest to bond with his devout (and reluctantly retired) father.
episodes.title: Holy Crap

episodes.synopsis: Peter creates his version of the perfect society after the world is destroyed in a Y2K apocalypse.
episodes.title: Da Boom

episodes.synopsis: Brian believes that his incontinence is linked to his romantic feelings for Lois.
episodes.title: Brian in Love

episodes.synopsis: A war over a parade trophy erupts between the Griffins and their neighbors. Also, social workers place Stewie in a foster home.
episodes.title: Love Thy Trophy

episodes.synopsis: Peter fakes his death to avoid paying his doctor bill, so Death pays him a visit. While chasing Peter, Death twists his ankle.
episodes.title: Death Is a Bitch

episodes.synopsis: Lois becomes the director of the Quahog Players and decides to stage "The King and I." But Peter takes over the production and changes it.
episodes.title: The King Is Dead

episodes.synopsis: Peter gets in touch with his feminine side after a female co-worker sues him for sexual harassment.
episodes.title: I Am Peter, Hear Me Roar

episodes.synopsis: Peter's "little white lie" about Chris having done his homework snowballs... culminating in Peter being worshipped as a god.
episodes.title: If I'm Dyin', I'm Lyin'

episodes.synopsis: Peter and Lois become political opponents in their bids to become the new school board president.
episodes.title: Running Mates

episodes.synopsis: The Griffins travel to New York City when Chris's talent as a painter catches the eye of an art gallery owner.
episodes.title: A Picture Is Worth a Thousand Bucks

episodes.synopsis: When the Griffins become a big hit on a daytime talk show, television executives offer them their own series.
episodes.title: Fifteen Minutes of Shame

episodes.synopsis: Mourning the loss of his mother, Brian accompanies Stewie on a road trip back to Quahog after the pair lose their airplane tickets.
episodes.title: Road to Rhode Island

episodes.synopsis: Peter masquerades as a student in his attempt to eradicate a "drug" problem at Meg's high school.
episodes.title: Let's Go to the Hop

episodes.synopsis: Stewie falls head over heels for a girl at his day-care center, and Peter convinces Lois to become a flight attendant so he can travel free of charge.
episodes.title: Dammit, Janet

episodes.synopsis: Peter's new mobster friend "takes care of business" for Peter and the kids -- but puts a contract out on Lois's life.
episodes.title: There's Something About Paulie

episodes.synopsis: As Chris attempts to lose weight through diet and exercise, Peter alters his own looks via liposuction and extensive plastic surgery.
episodes.title: He's Too Sexy For His Fat

episodes.synopsis: After learning that his property is not officially part of the United States, Peter forms his own country.
episodes.title: E. Peterbus Unum

episodes.synopsis: Meg attempts to interview Quahog's mayor, Adam West. But thanks to Peter's meddling, she ends up "outing" actor Luke Perry instead.
episodes.title: The Story on Page One

episodes.synopsis: Lois discovers that Peter possesses incredible musical skills at the piano -- but only when he is drunk.
episodes.title: Wasted Talent

episodes.synopsis: Intent on becoming an involved father, Peter gets Chris a job at a driving range. But Peter soon switches his focus to the more talented Cleveland Jr.
episodes.title: Fore Father

episodes.synopsis: After Joe notices Brian's keen sense of smell and puts him to work at the police department in narcotics, Brian becomes addicted to cocaine.
episodes.title: The Thin White Line

episodes.synopsis: Brian moves to Los Angeles to make it as a writer, but instead ends up directing pornographic films.
episodes.title: Brian Does Hollywood

episodes.synopsis: When Happy-Go-Lucky Toys is purchased by a tobacco conglomerate, Peter becomes a lobbyist in the nation's capital.
episodes.title: Mr. Griffin Goes to Washington

episodes.synopsis: After the Drunken Clam is destroyed by fire, Peter and his friends are framed as the arsonists. Meanwhile, Stewie plays Henry Higgins.
episodes.title: One If By Clam, Two If By Sea

episodes.synopsis: Chris teaches Peter the true meaning of penis envy. And after suffering outrageous humiliations, Meg gets revenge on the popular crowd.
episodes.title: And the Weiner Is..

episodes.synopsis: After a near-death experience on his wedding anniversary, Peter learns the importance of spending time with Lois.
episodes.title: Death Lives

episodes.synopsis: Lois takes up the martial art tae-jitsu and chases away New York tourists as the Griffin family learns how to love and hate each other better.
episodes.title: Lethal Weapons

episodes.synopsis: Meg and Neil intern at the television station, while Stewie loses his new tricycle to a bully.
episodes.title: The Kiss Seen Around the World

episodes.synopsis: After he is humiliated on career day at Chris's school, Peter decides to pursue his dream job of being a knight.
episodes.title: Mr. Saturday Knight

episodes.synopsis: Peter becomes a commercial fisherman and almost kills a locally known fishing legend, and Lois teaches Meg how to let loose for spring break.
episodes.title: A Fish Out of Water

episodes.synopsis: When Peter and Lois decide to have another baby, Stewie does whatever he can to prevent conception.
episodes.title: Emission Impossible

episodes.synopsis: Forced into the witness protection program, the Griffins move to a backwoods southern town.
episodes.title: To Love and Die in Dixie

episodes.synopsis: Brian gets an urge to have sex and finally chases down the champion greyhound owned by Peter's rich and snooty father-in-law.
episodes.title: Screwed the Pooch

episodes.synopsis: Peter discovers he has a black ancestor, and Stewie begins mimicking cheerleaders to harness their power of entrancement.
episodes.title: Peter Griffin: Husband, Father... Brother?

episodes.synopsis: After Joe fails to make an arrest because of his physical limitations, Peter helps him rebuild his self-esteem.
episodes.title: Ready, Willing and Disabled

episodes.synopsis: The Griffins attempt to have a merry Christmas despite Lois and her carefully laid holiday plans fallling apart.
episodes.title: A Very Special Family Guy Freakin' Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Brian is sentenced to care for a crabby old woman after he's arrested for drunk driving; Peter's beard becomes a home for birds.
episodes.title: Brian Wallows and Peter's Swallows

episodes.synopsis: Stewie attempts a career in show business. Meg, meanwhile, begins dating a nudist.
episodes.title: From Method to Madness

episodes.synopsis: Peter's jealousy of Lois's ex-boyfriend forces a trial separation. Meanwhile, Stewie and Brian get glued together.
episodes.title: Stuck Together, Torn Apart

episodes.synopsis: Stewie goes to England to take refuge in his favorite television show, while Lois embarrasses Peter at a KISS concert.
episodes.title: European Road Show

episodes.synopsis: Viewer mail inspires three stories in which Peter loses his bones, the Griffins get superpowers, and Peter and his buddies appear as "Little Rascals."
episodes.title: Family Guy, Viewer Mail #1

episodes.synopsis: When Peter wishes for a "Jewish finance wizard" to help the family with their constant money problems, Max Weinstein comes to the rescue.
episodes.title: When You Wish Upon a Weinstein

episodes.synopsis: Peter and Lois go on a second honeymoon and end up battling Mel Gibson. Back at home, Chris is accused of drinking alcohol at a school dance.
episodes.title: North By North Quahog

episodes.synopsis: Lois thinks Chris murdered his substitute teacher's husband, while Brian teaches remedial English to a group of tough kids.
episodes.title: Fast Times at Buddy Cianci Jr. High

episodes.synopsis: Quagmire is arrested after he gets caught peeping into women's restroom stalls, and Peter goes blind after he ingests too many coins.
episodes.title: Blind Ambition

episodes.synopsis: After Meg gets a makeover, the family becomes a new singing sensation, à la "The Brady Bunch," culminating in an appearance on "Saturday Night Live."
episodes.title: Don't Make Me Over

episodes.synopsis: After discovering that Quagmire and Cleveland's wife, Loretta, are having an affair, Peter tries to rejuvenate Cleveland's manliness.
episodes.title: The Cleveland-Loretta Quagmire

episodes.synopsis: Peter ends up losing the kids to child services after he's diagnosed as being mentally unfit to be a parent.
episodes.title: Petarded

episodes.synopsis: Brian and Quagmire become finalists on the reality show "The Bachelorette," while Chris befriends his talking zit.
episodes.title: Brian the Bachelor

episodes.synopsis: In order to pay back an outstanding debt, Peter drafts a contract that sells Meg to Mort's son, Neil.
episodes.title: 8 Simple Rules for Buying My Teenage Daughter

episodes.synopsis: Lois breaks out of prison after she's arrested for stealing, forcing the Griffin family to take refuge in Quahog's Asiantown.
episodes.title: Breaking Out Is Hard to Do

episodes.synopsis: Peter puts his foot down after Lois begins a modeling career, and Stewie talks Brian into joining a pyramid scheme.
episodes.title: Model Misbehavior

episodes.synopsis: A jealous Peter befriends actor James Woods after Brian falls for an attractive African-American teacher.
episodes.title: Peter's Got Woods

episodes.synopsis: Peter and his buddies are shipwrecked on an island and given up for dead. When Peter finally returns home, he discovers Lois has moved on without him.
episodes.title: The Perfect Castaway

episodes.synopsis: After being subjected to the tortures of the "freshman hunt" at school, Chris decides to join the Peace Corps -- and soon finds himself married.
episodes.title: Jungle Love

episodes.synopsis: Peter starts his own television station after the FCC overreacts to an incident on the Emmy Awards and begins censoring Quahog's TV broadcasts.
episodes.title: PTV

episodes.synopsis: Brian goes back to college to get his degree. Meanwhile, Peter and his friends form their own version of "The A-Team."
episodes.title: Brian Goes Back to College

episodes.synopsis: Peter tries to bond with Stewie by taking him to Disney World, and Herbert gets Chris to repay a debt by having him do chores around the house.
episodes.title: The Courtship of Stewie's Father

episodes.synopsis: Peter creates an organization for overweight people, and Lois discovers she has a homicidal brother who preys on the obese.
episodes.title: The Fat Guy Strangler

episodes.synopsis: When his Catholic father comes to the house for a visit, Peter decides to form his own religion and begins worshiping the Fonz from "Happy Days."
episodes.title: The Father, the Son and the Holy Fonz

episodes.synopsis: After Peter hits Brian with his car, Brian grows depressed -- until he appears onstage with Frank Sinatra Jr. Meg tells everyone she's a lesbian.
episodes.title: Brian Sings and Swings

episodes.synopsis: While attending his high school reunion, Peter befriends quarterback Tom Brady, who makes Peter a member of the New England Patriots.
episodes.title: Patriot Games

episodes.synopsis: When Peter goes on "Wheel of Fortune" and wins a maid for a week, Quagmire becomes smitten with her and ends up popping the question.
episodes.title: I Take Thee, Quagmire

episodes.synopsis: A pregnancy scare forces Peter to undergo a vasectomy, but not before he wreaks havoc at a sperm bank.
episodes.title: Sibling Rivalry

episodes.synopsis: Brian and Stewie go undercover to expose the mayor as corrupt after Meg gets a job as an intern in his office.
episodes.title: Deep Throats

episodes.synopsis: Peter becomes a best-selling erotic novelist, and Peter's father-in-law, Carter, is sued for publishing Peter's books on tape.
episodes.title: Peterotica

episodes.synopsis: Brian's gay cousin Jasper comes to visit and announces he's marrying his partner at the Griffins' house, but Mayor West bans gay marriage in Quahog.
episodes.title: You May Now Kiss the... Uh... Guy Who Receives

episodes.synopsis: When Joe builds a home theater, Peter decides to build a multiplex in his backyard. While digging, Peter disturbs a sacred Indian burial ground.
episodes.title: Petergeist

episodes.synopsis: When burglars break into the Griffin house, Peter takes the family into the "panic room," where they become trapped without food or water.
episodes.title: The Griffin Family History

episodes.synopsis: Stewie vows to change his evil ways after he has a near-death experience, and Peter gets to air his gripes on the local news.
episodes.title: Stewie B. Goode

episodes.synopsis: Stewie convinces Brian to go on a road trip with him to San Francisco to search for a man whom Stewie believes is his real father.
episodes.title: Bango Was His Name Oh!

episodes.synopsis: Stewie meets his future self and sees what life has in store for him. However, Stewie doesn't like what he sees -- so he aims to change his destiny.
episodes.title: Stu and Stewie's Excellent Adventure

episodes.synopsis: After his first prostate exam, Peter is convinced that he's been sexually violated. Lois earns Stewie's undying devotion when she rescues Rupert.
episodes.title: Stewie Loves Lois

episodes.synopsis: Peter feels abandoned when his mother gets a divorce... until he sees a father figure in her new boyfriend, Tom Tucker. Brian becomes a shock jock.
episodes.title: Mother Tucker

episodes.synopsis: After Peter uses Meg's money to buy himself a tank, she gets a job at the new Super Store USA. A corporate giant sucks up all the city's electricity.
episodes.title: Hell Comes to Quahog

episodes.synopsis: When Army recruiters show up at Chris's high school, Brian drags Stewie to recruiting headquarters to complain. Meanwhile, Chris joins a goth band.
episodes.title: Saving Private Brian

episodes.synopsis: When Peter blows off his fingers in a fireworks accident, he corrals Lois into helping him out at work, which arouses his animal instincts.
episodes.title: Whistle While Your Wife Works

episodes.synopsis: Lois volunteers to teach a sex ed class but is fired for discussing condoms; a conservative minister takes over the class and preaches abstinence.
episodes.title: Prick Up Your Ears

episodes.synopsis: Stewie marries his old flame, Olivia, but her juice-drinking problem and his bad attitude quickly put their marriage on the rocks.
episodes.title: Chick Cancer

episodes.synopsis: Due to a sudden shortage of police officers in Quahog, Joe is forced to recruit Peter and his buddies into the police academy.
episodes.title: Barely Legal

episodes.synopsis: Brian mistakenly sells Rupert at the Griffins' yard sale. Peter loses his license after a nasty car crash and is forced to let Meg be his driver.
episodes.title: Road to Rupert

episodes.synopsis: After Peter accidentally kills his father, he learns that his real dad lives in Ireland and is the town drunk. Meanwhile, Stewie discovers spanking.
episodes.title: Peter's Two Dads

episodes.synopsis: Peter discovers the thrill of being the neighborhood bully, but it may cost him the love of his family and friends. Stewie gets addicted to tanning.
episodes.title: The Tan Aquatic with Steve Zissou

episodes.synopsis: After seeing the Redneck Comedy Tour, Peter becomes enamored with the redneck lifestyle. Quagmire moves in with the Griffins.
episodes.title: Airport '07

episodes.synopsis: Lois insists that Brian learn to use the toilet, so Brian enlists Stewie as his trainer. Bill Clinton shows Peter you're only as old as you act.
episodes.title: Bill and Peter's Bogus Journey

episodes.synopsis: When Peter decides to fulfill his life's dream and open a restaurant, the restaurant becomes the new hangout for Joe and all his handicapped friends.
episodes.title: No Meals on Wheels

episodes.synopsis: The family flees to Texas when their congregation believes that Stewie is possessed by the devil. Stewie enters the Little Miss Texas pageant.
episodes.title: Boys Do Cry

episodes.synopsis: When Chris is expelled, he's sent to the fancy boarding school that Lois's grandfather attended, but he doesn't quite fit in.
episodes.title: No Chris Left Behind

episodes.synopsis: When the local oil refinery dumps toxic waste into Lake Quahog, Lois runs for mayor. Peter enjoys the perks of being the First Lady of Quahog.
episodes.title: It Takes a Village Idiot (and I Married One)

episodes.synopsis: Death grants Peter's wish to travel back in time to before he was married, when he broke a date with Lois to party with Molly Ringwald.
episodes.title: Meet the Quagmires

episodes.synopsis: When the power goes out, Peter decides to entertain the family with his version of the Star Wars saga, starring Peter as an extra-large Han Solo.
episodes.title: Blue Harvest

episodes.synopsis: Peter convinces Brian to get serious with his girlfriend, so Brian and Jillian get their own place. Stewie has to move in to help pay the rent.
episodes.title: Movin' Out (Brian's Song)

episodes.synopsis: Joe's thrilled after having leg transplant surgery, but he drives the guys to exhaustion doing all the things he couldn't do before.
episodes.title: Believe It or Not Joe's Walking on Air

episodes.synopsis: Creator Seth MacFarlane hosts a look at some of the funniest moments and musical numbers from the first 100 episodes of the show.
episodes.title: 100th Episode Special

episodes.synopsis: Lois and Peter go on a cruise without the family. Stewie vows his revenge; when Brian challenges him to follow through, Stewie intercepts the ship.
episodes.title: Stewie Kills Lois: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Lois charges Stewie with attempted murder. Stewie forces Brian to drive him to CIA headquarters, where he carries out his plan for world domination.
episodes.title: Lois Kills Stewie: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Feeling patriotic after a Veterans Day parade, Peter campaigns against illegal immigrants. But he soon discovers he is an illegal immigrant himself.
episodes.title: Padre de Familia

episodes.synopsis: When Meg awakens from a coma, she falls for an intern and gets pregnant; Peter insists the couple marry. Brian and Stewie buy a fixer-upper house.
episodes.title: Peter's Daughter

episodes.synopsis: Peter saves the owner of McBurgertown and gets free burgers for life. After eating 30 burgers, Peter has a stroke and sues the company.
episodes.title: McStroke

episodes.synopsis: After being locked in a crate by Peter, James Woods returns to seek revenge by stealing Peter's identity and taking over as head of the household.
episodes.title: Back to the Woods

episodes.synopsis: Brian wins a trip to Martha's Vineyard and invites Peter and Lois. When Peter spends the entire time getting drunk, Brian confesses his love for Lois.
episodes.title: Play It Again Brian

episodes.synopsis: When Brian's ex brings her wild teenage son to the Griffins' house, Brian's attitude toward parenting drives Peter and his friends crazy.
episodes.title: Former Life of Brian

episodes.synopsis: It's a pirate's life for Peter when he gets a parrot, but after terrorizing the neighbors, Peter accidentally kills his beloved pet.
episodes.title: Long John Peter

episodes.synopsis: When Stewie convinces Brian to go slowly with his new girlfriend, Carolyn, Cleveland moves in and steals her away.
episodes.title: Love Blactually

episodes.synopsis: Peter rediscovers his love for the painfully annoying song "Surfin' Bird," which drives people around him crazy.
episodes.title: I Dream of Jesus

episodes.synopsis: When Mort accidentally steps into a time machine, Stewie and Brian decide to follow him. But they end up in Poland on the day of the Nazi invasion.
episodes.title: Road to Germany

episodes.synopsis: When Peter gets a free gas card, the family decides to hit the road on vacation, but they accidentally leave Stewie behind.
episodes.title: Baby Not on Board

episodes.synopsis: When Brian hurts his back saving Peter, Peter thinks Brian's getting too old and brings another dog -- named New Brian -- into the family.
episodes.title: The Man with Two Brians

episodes.synopsis: Peter's boss sends him back to third grade to qualify for a promotion at work. Brian and Frank Sinatra Jr. struggle to open a nightclub.
episodes.title: Tales of a Third Grade Nothing

episodes.synopsis: After seven years of pregnancy, Bonnie gives birth to baby Susie, and Stewie immediately falls in love.
episodes.title: Ocean's 3 1/2

episodes.synopsis: To pay off a massive debt, Peter participates in a medical experiment, allowing himself to be injected with the gay gene.
episodes.title: Family Gay

episodes.synopsis: Peter cashes in a raffle ticket and wins a golf outing with O.J. Simpson, but when he brings O.J. home, the residents of Quahog aren't very welcoming.
episodes.title: The Juice Is Loose

episodes.synopsis: Lois lands a job as a Fox news reporter. Her first assignment is an exposé on a liberal filmmaker, but her story implicates a conservative radio host.
episodes.title: Fox-y Lady

episodes.synopsis: After a day at the Quahog Star Trek convention, Stewie builds a transporter and beams the cast of "Star Trek: The Next Generation" into his room.
episodes.title: Not All Dogs Go to Heaven

episodes.synopsis: After Brian is thrown in jail for drug possession, he decides to launch a campaign to have marijuana legalized.
episodes.title: Episode 420

episodes.synopsis: When a baby girl beats Stewie in a fight, Peter takes him to a gym and injects him with steroids to pump him up.
episodes.title: Stew-roids

episodes.synopsis: Brian turns to the bottle when he discovers Jillian is engaged. After a night of drinking, he wakes up in bed next to Lauren Conrad of "The Hills."
episodes.title: We Love You, Conrad

episodes.synopsis: When Peter discovers the writings of Stephen King, he imagines his family plus Joe, Cleveland and Quagmire in three of King's most famous stories.
episodes.title: Three Kings

episodes.synopsis: Peter learns that in a previous life he was the founder of Quahog. As the story unfolds, King Stewart exiles Griffin Peterson to America.
episodes.title: Peter's Progress

episodes.synopsis: With the help of an out-of-this-world remote control, Stewie and Brian travel through alternate universes.
episodes.title: Road to Multiverse

episodes.synopsis: When Lois goes to the doctor to test for cancer, the doctor looks at her family medical history and surprises her with the news that she's Jewish.
episodes.title: Family Goy

episodes.synopsis: Stewie and Brian are suspicious when two guys move into Cleveland's old house, and when they find out Dan and Chevy are spies.
episodes.title: Spies Reminiscent of Us

episodes.synopsis: When Brian snags an older woman, he becomes the laughingstock of the family, but things go from bad to worse when she breaks her hip.
episodes.title: Brian's Got a Brand New Bag

episodes.synopsis: Stewie meets and becomes friends with a teen pop star, but things get weird after he discovers one of her darkest secrets.
episodes.title: Hannah Banana

episodes.synopsis: When Quagmire assumes responsibility for a baby who looks just like him, he quickly realizes he may be in over his head.
episodes.title: Quagmire's Baby

episodes.synopsis: Feeling blue, Peter and the guys interview potential friends to fill the vacancy left by Cleveland.
episodes.title: Jerome Is the New Black

episodes.synopsis: When Brian accidentally kills another dog, he is surprised to see that no one cares -- so he tries to convince everyone that a dog's life has value.
episodes.title: Dog Gone

episodes.synopsis: When Peter gives Lois's father the bachelor party he never had, Mr. Pewterschmidt slips into a coma, and not even Dr. House can bring him out of it.
episodes.title: Business Guy

episodes.synopsis: After Peter hits his head, he develops amnesia and forgets everything, including his family and his friends.
episodes.title: Big Man on Hippocampus

episodes.synopsis: Brian gets a gig writing about the average teen girl, but when he trails Meg for research he learns that she's in touch with a guy in the slammer.
episodes.title: Dial Meg for Murder

episodes.synopsis: When Chris and Stewie go missing, Lois sees a psychic. Even after the boys return home, Lois and Peter's psychic obsession continues.
episodes.title: Extra-Large Medium

episodes.synopsis: Stewie wants to audition for his favorite show, but when he finds out they are only auditioning girls, he creates an alter ego by dressing in drag.
episodes.title: Go Stewie, Go!

episodes.synopsis: After Peter has some luck selling footage of a celebrity he caught off-guard, he decides to become a full-time paparazzo.
episodes.title: Peter-assment

episodes.synopsis: When Lois reads Brian's pilot script, she falls in love with it and insists that he meet with network executives to pitch it.
episodes.title: Brian Griffin's House of Payne

episodes.synopsis: When the local news announces that Earth will be destroyed in 24 hours, everyone in Quahog goes nuts trying to live out their last day.
episodes.title: April in Quahog

episodes.synopsis: In the special 150th episode, Brian and Stewie get locked in a bank vault where they are forced to deal with each other on a whole new level.
episodes.title: Brian & Stewie

episodes.synopsis: Quagmire gets the surprise of his life on Mother's Day, when his father starts to go through the change of his life.
episodes.title: Quagmire's Dad

episodes.synopsis: Peter, Quagmire and Joe's search for the source of all dirty jokes leads them to Virginia, where they reunite with Cleveland and meet his new family.
episodes.title: The Splendid Source

episodes.synopsis: When the Griffins and other residents of Quahog are invited to visit the mansion of James Woods, the evening turns into a real murder mystery.
episodes.title: And Then There Were Fewer Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The finger of blame for the murders continues to point at different people as even more members of the group turn up dead.
episodes.title: And Then There Were Fewer Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Brian learns that Rush Limbaugh is going to be at the mall for a book signing, he decides to go there and give him a piece of his left-wing mind.
episodes.title: Excellence in Broadcasting

episodes.synopsis: After Peter catches Lois's dad having an affair, he is strong-armed into keeping it a secret.
episodes.title: Welcome Back Carter

episodes.synopsis: Peter and Joe team up to execute a series of painful and humiliating Halloween pranks on unsuspecting family, friends and neighbors.
episodes.title: Halloween on Spooner Street

episodes.synopsis: When Peter receives tickets to a boxing match as a birthday gift, he volunteers Lois to compete.
episodes.title: Baby You Knock Me Out

episodes.synopsis: Feeling discouraged with the progress of his writing career, Brian decides to throw in the towel -- until Stewie become his manager.
episodes.title: Brian Writes a Bestseller

episodes.synopsis: Stewie and Brian travel to the North Pole to find Santa and teach him a lesson in holiday cheer.
episodes.title: Road to the North Pole Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Brian and Stewie reach the North Pole, where they discover the terrible toll Christmas has taken on Santa.
episodes.title: Road to the North Pole Part 2

episodes.synopsis: After years of drinking with the guys, Peter's love of the sauce has finally caught up with him and he needs a kidney transplant.
episodes.title: New Kidney in Town

episodes.synopsis: Lois becomes friends with local news anchor Joyce Kinney and agrees to let Joyce do a story on her as the model American housewife.
episodes.title: And I'm Joyce Kinney

episodes.synopsis: After a public disturbance, Peter and Brian are forced to attend a 12-step meeting to help kick their drinking problems.
episodes.title: Friends of Peter G

episodes.synopsis: Chris befriends a puppeteer named Franz who turns out to have a checkered past.
episodes.title: German Guy

episodes.synopsis: When Bonnie goes out of town, Meg offers to check in on Joe, but she soon becomes a little too involved and starts freaking everyone out.
episodes.title: The Hand that Rocks the Wheelchair

episodes.synopsis: Chris and Meg think their parents have it easy, and Peter and Lois beg to differ, so in order to teach each other a lesson, they all trade roles.
episodes.title: Trading Places

episodes.synopsis: When the local dry cleaner loses Peter's favorite white shirt, he goes ballistic.
episodes.title: Tiegs for Two

episodes.synopsis: When Mayor West marries Lois's sister, Carol, they move into the Griffins' house to be one big "happy" family.
episodes.title: Brothers & Sisters

episodes.synopsis: Stewie and Brian go back in time to stop Bertram from killing Leonardo da Vinci.
episodes.title: The Big Bang Theory

episodes.synopsis: When Bonnie and Lois take a trip to Paris, Bonnie crosses the line while in the City of Love.
episodes.title: Foreign Affairs

episodes.synopsis: The Griffins reprise their intergalactic roles in an outrageous retelling of Return of the Jedi.
episodes.title: It's a Trap

episodes.synopsis: Peter blows his savings on lottery tickets, and the family writes it off as one of his usual shenanigans until they end up millionaires.
episodes.title: Lottery Fever

episodes.synopsis: When a storm hits Quahog, Brian consumes some questionable substances to calm his nerves. Meanwhile, Meg finally goes off the deep end.
episodes.title: Seahorse Seashell Party

episodes.synopsis: When Quagmire lands in the hospital, his sister rushes to Quahog to nurse him back to health. But Glenn soon realizes she's the one who needs help.
episodes.title: Screams of Silence: The Story of Brenda Q

episodes.synopsis: Guest star Ryan Reynolds visits Quahog and becomes obsessed with Peter. Meanwhile, Stewie steals the family car and goes on a joyride.
episodes.title: Stewie Goes for a Drive

episodes.synopsis: Brian and Stewie travel back in time to the pilot episode of "Family Guy" to change history ... and then to change history again.
episodes.title: Back to the Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Lois cooks a big Thanksgiving meal and invites the whole crew over for dinner; Joe is shocked when his formerly MIA son, Kevin, returns from Iraq.
episodes.title: Thanksgiving

episodes.synopsis: On the return home after an adventurous day at an amusement park, the Griffins' car breaks down and strands them in Amish country.
episodes.title: Amish Guy

episodes.synopsis: Peter and the guys take a stand against their wives, and flee to the Deep South on a road trip. But on the way there, the men land in jail.
episodes.title: Cool Hand Peter

episodes.synopsis: When Lois's dad, Carter, falls asleep at the wheel, the family decides it might be time for him to retire. But he won't go down without a fight.
episodes.title: Grumpy Old Man

episodes.synopsis: When Meg finally turns 18, Quagmire seizes the opportunity to pursue his next romantic conquest. Peter tries to put a stop to the creepy couple.
episodes.title: Quagmire and Meg

episodes.synopsis: Brian starts dating a blind girl, but things get dicey when she divulges that she hates dogs. Meanwhile, Peter decides to live upstairs full-time.
episodes.title: The Blind Side

episodes.synopsis: Stewie's new friend falls ill with a critical, but treatable, disease. However, the boy's parents refuse treatment due to their religious beliefs.
episodes.title: Livin' on a Prayer

episodes.synopsis: Peter wants to be a star, and decides to reach his goal by first becoming Tom Tucker's agent. Chris dates a girl who looks like one of the Griffins.
episodes.title: Tom Tucker: The Man and His Dream

episodes.synopsis: When Peter tries to salvage a sunken Mercedes-Benz, Peter promises a favor to a helpful dolphin. Soon the dolphin moves in and outstays his welcome.
episodes.title: Be Careful What You Fish For

episodes.synopsis: Overwhelmed with financial troubles, Mort asks Peter and Quagmire to help save his pharmacy. The guys have a fool-proof plan for making things worse.
episodes.title: Burning Down the Bayit

episodes.synopsis: When Peter and Chris go away to fat camp, they cross paths with a serial killer. Meanwhile, Stewie is traumatized by the cover of a Queen album.
episodes.title: Killer Queen

episodes.synopsis: When a guy's night out takes a sudden turn, Peter, Joe, Brian and Quagmire wake up in a hospital and discover all of Quahog has been deserted.
episodes.title: Forget-Me-Not

episodes.synopsis: After Peter's favorite children's television show gets canceled, he takes matters into his own hands by creating and starring in his own program.
episodes.title: You Can't Do That on Television, Peter

episodes.synopsis: Stewie becomes smitten over a girl who happens to be a female version of himself. Meanwhile, Peter and Quagmire take their friendship to a new level.
episodes.title: Mr. and Mrs. Stewie

episodes.synopsis: When Meg travels to Europe, her adventure comes to a halt when she gets kidnapped. Brian and Stewie embark on an action-packed mission to find her.
episodes.title: Leggo My Meg-O

episodes.synopsis: After Quahog City Hall threatens to shut down Peter's illegal business, Peter joins the Tea Party and campaigns to shut down the government.
episodes.title: Tea Peter

episodes.synopsis: Brian and Stewie continue a show tradition, responding to viewer mail. Meet a British version of the Griffins, as Quahog is taken over by a comedian.
episodes.title: Family Guy Viewer Mail #2

episodes.synopsis: Peter encourages Joe to have a one-night stand with his attractive new partner in order to even the score with Bonnie for her own indiscretions.
episodes.title: Internal Affairs

episodes.synopsis: The Griffins decide to climb Mount Everest after their competitive family friends announce their ambitious plans to hike the legendary mountain.
episodes.title: Into Fat Air

episodes.synopsis: The Griffins are selected to be a Nielsen family and have their television viewing habits monitored. However, Peter takes his enthusiasm too far.
episodes.title: Ratings Guy

episodes.synopsis: Carter's pharmaceutical company is withholding a cancer cure from the public in order to gain more profit. Brian and Stewie plot to expose the secret.
episodes.title: The Old Man and the Big C

episodes.synopsis: Using Stewie's time machine, Brian accidentally causes time to run in reverse. They must figure out how to restore time before Stewie is unborn.
episodes.title: Yug Ylimaf

episodes.synopsis: Fans get a behind-the-scenes look at this irreverent comedy's most outrageous moments, through interviews with creator Seth MacFarlane.
episodes.title: 200 Episodes Later

episodes.synopsis: The criminal who, years ago, shot Joe and left him in a wheelchair is now a fugitive. So Quagmire, Joe and Peter team up to hunt the bad guy down.
episodes.title: Joe's Revenge

episodes.synopsis: Lois experiences a midlife crisis, and Peter tries to keep up with her new, wild lifestyle. Meanwhile, Stewie brings home a turtle from the park.
episodes.title: Lois Comes Out of Her Shell

episodes.synopsis: When Meg finally gathers the courage to ask out her crush, Kent, she is devastated to learn he's gay -- and that he has feelings for Chris.
episodes.title: Friends Without Benefits

episodes.synopsis: As the family gathers around the Christmas tree, Peter tells his own version of the Nativity story.
episodes.title: Jesus, Mary and Joseph!

episodes.synopsis: When the Griffins pick up Chris from space camp, they accidentally are launched into space. It's up to Chris to land them safely back on earth.
episodes.title: Space Cadet

episodes.synopsis: Brian writes a play that's a hit in Quahog, but his confidence is shaken when he reads a play Stewie wrote that's much better than his.
episodes.title: Brian's Play

episodes.synopsis: While visiting Harvard University, Quagmire accidentally marries a prostitute. To get out of the marriage, Quagmire and Peter pose as lovers.
episodes.title: The Giggity Wife

episodes.synopsis: Love is in the air on Valentine's Day, as Peter and Lois decide to stay in bed all day. Meanwhile, Meg has a date with a guy she met on the Internet.
episodes.title: Valentine's Day In Quahog

episodes.synopsis: Chris steals money from Lois's purse, but Meg catches him in the act. Meanwhile, Stewie and Brian become obsessed with singer Anne Murray.
episodes.title: Chris Cross

episodes.synopsis: Looking for a job of her own, Lois gets discovered by a "voiceover" talent agent -- who actually runs an adult-only phone line.
episodes.title: Call Girl

episodes.synopsis: After ending up in the hospital from an unfortunate skydiving accident, Peter befriends Mahmoud, who convinces him to convert to Islam.
episodes.title: Turban Cowboy

episodes.synopsis: A bloody murder occurs at Mayor West's mansion, and he is the prime suspect. It's up to the citizens of Quahog to determine if he is guilty or not.
episodes.title: 12 and a Half Angry Men

episodes.synopsis: When Peter, Quagmire and Joe crash-land in the wilderness, Peter is found months later as a feral creature who cannot communicate intelligently.
episodes.title: Bigfat

episodes.synopsis: After teddy bear Rupert gets recalled, Stewie stops at nothing to get back his friend. Meanwhile, Lois fills in for Peter at his bowling tournament.
episodes.title: Total Recall

episodes.synopsis: When the owner of the Clam is killed, the bar closes. Peter, Quagmire and Joe must find a way to save their beloved watering hole.
episodes.title: Save the Clam

episodes.synopsis: When the Griffins move to a farm, Peter gets into the illicit drug business, à la "Breaking Bad."
episodes.title: Farmer Guy

episodes.synopsis: Stewie and Brian use a time machine to go to Las Vegas for a Bette Midler concert, but the machine malfunctions and creates alt-versions of the pair.
episodes.title: Road to Vegas

episodes.synopsis: The Griffins are invited to join the prestigious Barrington Country Club and, of course, get thrown out.
episodes.title: No Country Club for Old Men

episodes.synopsis: When Peter spies what he believes to be a treasure map hidden on a restaurant placemat, the whole town comes down with a serious case of gold fever.
episodes.title: Finders Keepers

episodes.synopsis: A suspicious lump on Peter's neck turns out to be Chip, his vestigial twin, whose winning personality drives Peter toward amputation.
episodes.title: Vestigial Peter

episodes.synopsis: When Quagmire becomes the sex slave of an overzealous woman, it's up to Peter, Joe and Quagmire's transgender mother to free him from bondage.
episodes.title: Quagmire's Quagmire

episodes.synopsis: A new kid at school -- nicknamed "Mental Mike" -- makes plans to beat up Meg after she accidentally spills her lunch on him.
episodes.title: A Fistful of Meg

episodes.synopsis: On a family trip to Italy, Peter decides the Griffins should live there permanently. But becoming Italians makes returning home far more difficult.
episodes.title: Boopa-Dee Bappa-Dee

episodes.synopsis: Brian dies in a tragic car accident. But with Stewie's time machine utterly destroyed, it's impossible to go back and change history.
episodes.title: Life of Brian

episodes.synopsis: After accidentally discovering they make beautiful music together, Peter and Quagmire begin performing as a Simon & Garfunkel-type duo.
episodes.title: Into Harmony's Way

episodes.synopsis: Still mourning the loss of Brian, Stewie works out a way to change the past. Meanwhile, Peter tries to get his father-in-law to like Christmas.
episodes.title: Christmas Guy

episodes.synopsis: When Peter loses his job and becomes a stay-at-home dad while Lois goes to work, it leads to unexpected problems in the bedroom.
episodes.title: Peter Problems

episodes.synopsis: Three popular Grimm's fairy tales -- Cinderella, Jack and the Beanstalk, and Little Red Riding Hood -- get the full Griffin family treatment.
episodes.title: Grimm Job

episodes.synopsis: Brian exploits his estranged human son's status as a television star to further his own writing career. Peter shoots Quagmire on a hunting trip.
episodes.title: Brian's a Bad Father

episodes.synopsis: When his mom passes away, Peter grows closer to her longtime friend, Evelyn -- then becomes the object of Evelyn's ardent affections.
episodes.title: Mom's the Word

episodes.synopsis: Peter and his friends go on a quest to find God, not for spiritual guidance but to ask him to stop influencing the outcome of professional football.
episodes.title: 3 Acts of God

episodes.synopsis: When Carter names Chris his sole heir, a desperate Peter goes to surprising lengths to suck up to him and reap the rewards of the family fortune.
episodes.title: Fresh Heir

episodes.synopsis: Soon after he starts smoking, Peter is approached by an advertising executive to be the face of an anti-smoking campaign.
episodes.title: Secondhand Spoke

episodes.synopsis: Brian gives Stewie herpes. Meanwhile, Peter and his friends are forced to fight for their favorite booth at the Drunken Clam.
episodes.title: Herpe the Love Sore

episodes.synopsis: After Peter brings the wrong baby home from the park, he vows to become more responsible so that Lois doesn't think he's an idiot.
episodes.title: The Most Interesting Man in the World

episodes.synopsis: When Chris runs away with Jerome's daughter, Pam, against her father's wishes, Peter and Jerome must join forces to find them.
episodes.title: Baby Got Black

episodes.synopsis: Peter shows Meg how to party while accompanying her on a college interview. Brian must live in the wild after he's sprayed by a skunk.
episodes.title: Meg Stinks!

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland Brown is back in town, and Peter couldn't be happier. But a rift between their wives puts their friendship on hold.
episodes.title: He's Bla-Ack!

episodes.synopsis: Fed up with being a Griffin, Stewie alters the past to change his present. But he winds up being born into a British household a-la "Downton Abbey."
episodes.title: Chap Stewie
